entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with flurries beginning near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries or local snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
